name: S T A L I N H E A R T
name_original: S T A L I N H E A R T
description:
You are the leader of this empire built by yourself! You've been controlling your people by using opression, parades and forced work! Your empire is big but might not last forever! Control this distopy! Like the Big Brother

MADE BY:

Daniel Alvarez Rosales

Leonardo Lizano Najera

Monica Saenz Morales

Game made with common creative assets and own art.

- A tribute to George Orwell, "1984"
